import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{loginThunk,registerThunk,avatarThunk,getUserDataThunk,followThunk,getFollowersThunk,getFollowingThunk,logoutThunk}from"../asyncThunks/user.thunk";export var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:{token:"",data:"",avatar:"",error:null,isLoading:false,isUserDataLoading:false,userData:{},userDataError:"",isFollowLoading:false,followData:[],followError:null,isFollowingLoading:false,followingData:[],followingError:null,isFollowersLoading:false,followersData:[],followersError:null},reducers:{},extraReducers:function extraReducers(builder){//loginThunk
builder.addCase(loginThunk.pending,function(state){state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(loginThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.data=action.payload;state.token=action.payload.token;state.avatar=action.payload.avatar;localStorage.setItem("questify-log-isauth-T",action.payload.token);}).addCase(loginThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;})//registerThunk
.addCase(registerThunk.pending,function(state){state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(registerThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.data=action.payload;state.token=action.payload.token;localStorage.setItem("questify-log-isauth-T",action.payload.token);}).addCase(registerThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;})//avatarThunk
.addCase(avatarThunk.pending,function(state){state.isLoading=true;}).addCase(avatarThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.avatar=action.payload.avatar;}).addCase(avatarThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isLoading=false;state.error=action.payload;})//getUserData
.addCase(getUserDataThunk.pending,function(state){state.isUserDataLoading=true;}).addCase(getUserDataThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isUserDataLoading=false;state.userData=action.payload;}).addCase(getUserDataThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isUserDataLoading=false;state.userDataError=action.payload;})//follow
.addCase(followThunk.pending,function(state){state.isFollowLoading=true;}).addCase(followThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isFollowLoading=false;state.followData=action.payload;}).addCase(followThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isFollowLoading=false;state.followError=action.payload;})//get followers
.addCase(getFollowersThunk.pending,function(state){state.isFollowersLoading=true;}).addCase(getFollowersThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isFollowersLoading=false;state.followersData=action.payload;}).addCase(getFollowersThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isFollowersLoading=false;state.followersError=action.payload;})//get followings
.addCase(getFollowingThunk.pending,function(state){state.isFollowingLoading=true;}).addCase(getFollowingThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isFollowingLoading=false;state.followingData=action.payload;}).addCase(getFollowingThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isFollowingLoading=false;state.followingError=action.payload;})//logout
.addCase(logoutThunk.pending,function(state){state.isLogoutLoading=true;}).addCase(logoutThunk.fulfilled,function(state,action){state.isLogoutLoading=false;state.logoutData=action.payload;}).addCase(logoutThunk.rejected,function(state,action){state.isLogoutLoading=false;state.logoutError=action.payload;});}});export var data=function data(state){return state.user.data;};export var isLoading=function isLoading(state){return state.user.isLoading;};export var error=function error(state){return state.user.error;};export var token=function token(state){return state.user.token;};export default userSlice.reducer;
